articles.title: 5 Park Seo-joon K-dramas to watch on his b'day - India Today
articles.description: It is South Korean star Park Seo-joon's birthday today, December 16. And what better way to celebrate the happy occasion than by watching his top K-dramas?
articles.content: The 2016 show features a stellar cast of BTS' V, Park Hyung-sik and of course, the main star, Park Seo-joon in pivotal roles. The period drama focuses its lens on a group of warrior men called Hwaran… [+1 chars]
